reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major lysosomal storage disease subcategories: Gaucher disease (~1), Fabry disease (~0.8), Niemann-Pick disease (~0.5), Mucopolysaccharidosis types (~1.5), GM2 gangliosidosis (~0.5), Pompe disease (~0.5), Metachromatic leukodystrophy (~0.5), Glycogen storage diseases (~1), and other rare LSDs (~1) = approximately 7 per 100k. Low confidence due to heterogeneity of subcategories and incomplete epidemiological data for some rare subtypes.
